School Specialization (Evocation): Extra Evocation spell/dy each spell level
Simple Somatics: No arcane spell failure in light armor
Arcane Spell Failure: 20%
Bonded Object: May cast known spell through object
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Cackle Hex: R30' Extends self agony, charm, evil eye, fortune, and misfortune hex effects for 1 rd
Cantrips: May cast 0-level spells
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
Flight Hex: May use self Feather Fall effects at will, self Levitate 1/dy, self Fly effects 6 min/dy
Force Missile: Magic Missile 1d4+3 HP 4/dy
Healing Hex: May use Cure Moderate Wounds effects 1/target/dy
Intense Spells: +3 Evocation spell damage
Maker's Call: May use Dimension Door effects to bring eidolon adjacent 1/dy
Patron: Knows additional spells
School Opposition (Conjuration): Double cost to cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Transmutation): Double cost to cast Transmutation spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Summon Monster: May cast Summon Monster IV, lasting 7 min, when eidolon not present 6/dy
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
Witch's Familiar: Familiar stores spells

Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage

Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Flight Evolution: 30' Fly
Gills Evolution: May breathe underwater
Gore Evolution: Horn attack inflicts 1d6+4 HP
Limbs (Arms) Evolution: Has 1 pairs of arms
Link (Summoner): May communicate on same plane w/eidolon over any distance/Shares magic item slots w/eidolon
Multiattack: Reduce additional attack penalty to -2 or second attack at -5
Scent Evolution: R30' May detect foes by smell
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that affect self on eidolon as touch spells
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
Skilled Evolution: +8 on each of 1 chosen skill(s)
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
Trample Evolution: Full-round automatic overrun inflicts 1d6+6 HP (DC 17 Ref half)
